description: This script initializes and manages the start of the 'parodus' process related to device health checks and configuration retrieval. It reads various device status parameters, constructs a command to start 'parodus' with appropriate arguments, and manages the process startup, including waiting for prerequisites.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main script execution block that checks for existing command file, fetches device info, constructs the parodus command, and initiates the process.
